title: PDF Processor
disclaimer: For learning and communication purposes only, not for commercial use.
pdfResizerDescription: Resize pages of selected PDF files, supporting preset and custom sizes.
sheinLabelGeneratorDescription: Merge EC Rep and barcode PDFs to generate labels compliant with Shein requirements.
operationFailed: Operation failed. Please check files or settings and try again.
unexpectedClientError: An unexpected client-side error occurred. Please try again.
updateRestartToInstall: Download complete. Restart the application to finish installation.
updateError: An error occurred during the update process: {error}
warningSaveSettings: Warning: Failed to save file selection settings.
errorSelectPdf: Please select a PDF file first.
errorInvalidFilenameChars: Filename contains invalid characters (e.g., < > : " / \ | ? *). Please remove them.
errorReservedFilename: Filename is a reserved system name (e.g., CON, PRN, AUX, NUL, COM1-9, LPT1-9). Please use another name.
errorInvalidFilenameEndings: Filename cannot start or end with a space, nor end with a period.
errorPositiveWidth: Width must be a valid positive number.
errorPositiveHeight: Height must be a valid positive number.
copyFileTooltip: Tries to copy the file to the clipboard (if it fails, copies the path).
warningFileCopiedPath: Could not copy the file itself, copied the file path to the clipboard instead.
warningEcRepPageCount: Warning: EC Rep file is usually 1 page. Current pages: {count}
checkEcRepPageCount: Please check, the EC Rep PDF file is usually a 1-page PDF
errorReadEcRepMetadata: Failed to read EC Rep file metadata: {error}
errorGetEcRepMetadata: Error getting EC Rep file metadata: {error}
errorReadBarcodeMetadata: Failed to read barcode file metadata: {error}
errorSelectEcRepFile: Please select the EC Rep file.
